publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4110 Linda Fabiani on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee: The Scottish Executive’s Fresh Talent Initiative—That the Parliament notes the 4th Report 2005 (Session 2) of the European and External Relations Committee, Report on an Inquiry into the Scottish Executive’s Fresh Talent Initiative Examining the Problems It Aims to Address, Its Operation, Challenges and Prospects (SP Paper 448).
